references.paper_title: Teaching large language models to self-debug
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of refinement, which is the core methodology used in the current paper for iterative code improvement.

references.paper_title: Is self-repair a silver bullet for code generation?
references.reason: This paper provides a key comparison baseline against which the performance of the new method is evaluated and discussed, demonstrating its superior performance.
This paper introduces the ARC dataset used for visual reasoning experiments, one of the three domains where the proposed method is tested.

references.paper_title: Learning nonlinear loop invariants with gated continuous logic networks
references.reason: This paper provides a baseline method for loop invariant synthesis, another domain for testing the new method, allowing for comparison and highlighting improvements.

references.paper_title: Measuring coding challenge competence with APPS
references.reason: This paper introduces the APPS benchmark, a challenging dataset used for competition-level programming problems, forming one of the experimental domains in the current research.
